channel.title: Comments on: MySQL Cluster 7.4.0 Labs Release
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../mysql-cluster-7-4-0-labs-released/index.html#comment-112814">Ricky Setyawan</a>.
Hi Ricky,
many more details (including what you're looking for) in this <a href="http://mikaelronstrom.blogspot.com/2014/03/the-year-of-2014-seems-to-be-year-of-in.html" title="MySQL Cluster 7.4.0 Lab Release Improvements" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">blog post from Mikael Ronstrom on the MySQL Cluster 7.4.0 improvements</a>.
Regards, Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ricky Setyawan.

Hi Ricky,

many more details (including what you’re looking for) in this blog post from Mikael Ronstrom on the MySQL Cluster 7.4.0 improvements.

Regards, Andrew.

item.title: By: Ricky Setyawan
item.dc:creator: Ricky Setyawan
item.description:
Hi Andrew,
Awesome improvement on performance! Any idea on the hardware config for those benchmarks?
Cheers, Ricky
item.content:encoded:
Hi Andrew,

Awesome improvement on performance! Any idea on the hardware config for those benchmarks?

Cheers,
Ricky

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../mysql-cluster-7-4-0-labs-released/index.html#comment-112403">Jim Dowling</a>.
Unfortunately, I'm not able to give dates.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jim Dowling.

Unfortunately, I’m not able to give dates.

item.title: By: Jim Dowling
item.dc:creator: Jim Dowling
item.description: Nice incremental improvements Andrew. How long until it is expected to go GA?
item.content:encoded:
Nice incremental improvements Andrew.
How long until it is expected to go GA?
